title: Mock Draft Monday: How Free Agency Will Change the First Round (Football 3/23)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by draft experts Ryan Wilson and Chris Trapasso to go over how free agency will affect the NFL Draft. The guys evaluate how additions and departures may change the drafting philosophy of certain teams. Will the Chargers eye a QB at #6 after letting Philip Rivers walk and not pursuing a veteran (11:50) ? What's different about the Panthers approach now at #7 after signing Teddy Bridgewater (14:40)? Seriously, what is Bill Belichick going to do to replace Tom Brady (27:15)? We address that and much more in the latest edition of 'Mock Draft Monday'.

Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @ChrisTrapasso

itunes:subtitle: Mock drafts could look a whole lot different this week following a flurry of free agency moves. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and Chris Trapasso break down those potential 1st round changes.
